selfHosted.title: Benefits of Hosting Your Own Server
items: Freely choose network bandwidth and server storage capacity based on your needs.
Control each user's data access permissions to enhance information security.
Upgrade server components (memory, CPU, storage) to improve performance.
No monthly hosting or co-location fees, reducing long-term operating costs.
Add Mail, FTP, Web and other services as required by your business.
Database quantity and capacity are not restricted.

difference.title: Servers vs. Standard PCs
items: More powerful CPUs designed to handle workloads from multiple client machines simultaneously.
Supports much higher memory (up to 96 GB compared to a typical PC’s 32 GB) for better performance.
Enterprise-grade drives support high concurrent access, long-term stable operation, and quick replacement when failures occur.
Server power supplies are more stable and reliable, ensuring safe and continuous 24/7 operation.

step1.title: Server Installation, Configuration & Maintenance
step1.text: We provide server planning, installation, and configuration services tailored to your business needs, helping you build a stable infrastructure with ongoing maintenance and upgrade planning.

step2.title: Computer Hardware Planning, Integration & Repair
step2.text: From hardware repair, OS reinstallation, and licensed software setup to equipment upgrades and replacements, we design complete hardware and cabling solutions based on your company’s scale and budget.

step3.title: Information Security Planning & Deployment
step3.text: We assess internal security risks and help you implement firewalls, security management tools, backup strategies, and access control to build a secure and reliable IT environment.
